mean_en: to liquidate (a debt, such as a mortgage) by installment payments or payment into a sinking fund
word_etyma: a重复，再次 + mort死 + ize表动词→amortize分期偿还
sentence: It will take three months of payments to amortize my debt from buying this expensive T-shirt.
sentence_trans: 我将用三个月 分期付款来偿还我买这件昂贵T恤的欠款。
